title: See Invisibility
content:
See Invisibility Level 2 Divination Spell Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others. Until Long Rest 9mDEX Save Action Level 2 Spell Slot

See Invisibility

Level 2 Divination Spell

Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

See Invisibility is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. See Invisibility is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Divination school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or int
